Title: Ekubo Ouji
Description: ["A fusion of animation and claymation to teach kids discipline and morality originally aired as a part of the early morning children's program Hirake! Ponkikki before the anime was combined and released on VHS. Based on the children's book series ", Ekubo-chan to Buba-chan, '.']
Related: ['Other: Funassyi to Yukaina Kyoudai', 'Alternative version: FunaQ: Funassyi to Soutai-kun']
